title: Trump Weighing Easing Stay-at-Home Advice
itunes:title: Trump Weighing Easing Stay-at-Home Advice
description:
Dr. Julie Varughese, Chief Medical Officer at Americares, discusses the spread of the coronavirus and delivering emergency shipments of essential supplies to protect health care workers. Bloomberg News White House Correspondent Josh Wingrove talks about President Trump weighing considering stay-at-home advice. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Joe Nocera take a look at if states can mandate vaccinations for health-care workers. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne shares his insight on why the coronavirus might kill globalization. And we Drive to the Close with Charlie Bobrinskoy, Vice Chairman at Ariel Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
